p: Chakrabarty and co-workers also synthesized F-SiNPs by employing a top-down method [ 33]. Initially, a water soluble macro- reversible addition-fragmentation chain-transfer (RAFT) agent, containing triethoxysilane, was prepared and then utilized to make a fluorinated polymer in a surfactant-free emulsion by means of polymerization-induced self-assembly. Figure 1 shows the macro-RAFT agent (P(4VP salt- co-VTES)) and fluorinated polymer ((P(TFEMA)) that was prepared.
